features: MOISTURIZING: this shaving gel for women is specially designed for dry skin, helping to prevent moisture loss during shaving
RUST-FREE CAN: No longer worry about rust rings in your shower
HELPS PROTECT: the gel is enriched with glycerin and shea butter
RICH LATHER provides incredible razor glide to help protect the skin from nicks and cuts
body.description: Gillette Satin Care Dry Skin is a shaving gel for women designed for sensitive skin needing special care. This shaving cream for women helps lock in moisture for soft, smooth skin after every shave - It’s designed especially for dry skin. This shave gel for women, enriched with Glycerin and Shea Butter, is specially designed for dry skin. Glycerin helps the skin to attract and retain its own natural moisture, leaving it feeling soft and smooth. Satin Care Dry Skin shave gel's moisturizing formula helps protect the skin against moisture loss during the shave, leaving your skin incredibly soft and smooth. Satin Care Dry Skin offers a rich lather, which protects against nicks and cuts while shaving, delivering satiny smooth skin each time. Now available in a Rust-Free Can, so you don’t have to worry about rust rings in your shower. Dermatologist tested for sensitive skin. Shave with your favorite Venus razor for beautiful legs that look and feel like satin. Directions: Gently rub shave gel over wet skin to produce a rich lather for a smooth shave.

Ultra Sensitive Sensitive Skin Dry Skin Rust Free Can ✓ ✓ ✓ For Sensitive Skin ✓ ✓ For Dry Skin ✓ Fragrance Free ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m picky when it comes to fragrances but this shaving cream is delish! I’d use it as a body spray if they made some lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely Amazing For Anyone With Sensitive Skin
reviews.reviewText: As someone with very sensitive skin and curly hair that grows quickly, which is also prone to becoming ingrown, this is one of the first times that a shaving cream has been a sublime experience to use. All throughout my life shaving, at 41, after having tried a huge combination of shaving cream that’s been marketed to Men, something had to change, and finding this was a blessing for multiple reasons. 1. It didn’t cause me to have a rough shave, given that it’s extremely soothing and it applies smoothly. 2. For the amount you get, the price is superb, coming in at less than Men’s shaving cream, while still providing 3 more regular sized shaving cream gel cans. 3. The scent is a very neutral shea butter formula that doesn’t cause any conflict with aftershave, or moisturizer.In every regard, that makes this product an easy 5 stars from a comfort and shaving perspective. Even with a multi blade razor, after rinsing my face with hypoallergenic soap and warm water to make shaving go much more smoothly, there aren’t the usual small cuts that occur with any other shaving cream that I’ve tried. Shaving doesn’t feel like an ordeal anymore, so that’s another definite plus. It’s impossible not to highly recommend such a fantastic product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The smell, the smoothness after shaving, and the number of uses per can makes this a hreat buy. My boyfriend even uses it to shave his face and says he experiences less irritation and a more hydrated result.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this Shave Gel
reviews.reviewText: Love the smell! Lather’s easy don’t take but a tiny squirt, leaves skin soft

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick Easy Purchase
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite shave gel and I like being able to buy it in bulk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Amazing product! Ridiculous price hike from original price.
reviews.reviewText: I love this shaving cream. It’s the only one I can use that doesn’t leave my legs irritated for days. I have to give it four stars thou because they have double the price and it’s still continuing to rise every time I look at it. I get inflation, but the price is now almost triple what it used to be and unfortunately this is the only place it seems you can buy it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the smell and…
reviews.reviewText: It works great too! It just comes out kinda fast so I need to get used to using it!
